unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja's knee? Heard he twisted it during the 3rd ODI on 20/07/2024. Hope it's not too serious before the Asia Cup. Also, what's the word on Bumrah? Remember his back issue from last year. Hopefully, he'll be fit by 15/08/2024, 14:00 hrs. Getting nervous about the World Cup! Heard he's been training at NCA, Bangalore. Anyone got news on Prasidh Krishna too? Maybe by 02/10/2024, 17:00 hrs? Come on boys, get well soon! Chak de India!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja's knee? Heard he twisted it during the third O D I on twentieth july two thousand and twenty four. Hope it's not too serious before the Asia Cup. Also, what's the word on Bumrah? Remember his back issue from last year. Hopefully, he'll be fit by fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four, fourteen hundred hours. Getting nervous about the World Cup! Heard he's been training at N C A, Bangalore. Anyone got news on Prasidh Krishna too? Maybe by second october two thousand and twenty four, seventeen hundred hours? Come on boys, get well soon! Chak de India!
